name: Poool
description:
What if you could play pool in space? Well, I'm not sure if you'd want to, but now you can! Play solo in this wacky twist on normal pool and explore the different "planets" that are now at your disposal!

--- Controls ---

While Ready

Mouse Click + Drag: Rotate Camera

Space: Ready Cue Stick

With Cue Stick

Space: Charge Cue Stick

While Chasing

Mouse Movement: Rotate Camera
